Effect (string):
"Whilst this card is on the board
Negate the abilities of all support cards."
"How Arrogant! We're not equals! Your words are meaningless."
"Why do good people have to die?"
"Whilst this card is on the board Pick Might or Mind, players get +2 for each of that type of card on the board that they control."
"When this card is flipped Destroy target card on the board that does not share a faction with this card or a card your control."
"When this card is flipped Destroy the opponent's FLIPPED card."
"When this card is flipped If the opponents FLIPPED card is a support card, this card's power becomes 4."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get -2 points for each FIGHTER card they control."
"You can't protect the people you care about unless you're the strongest in the world!"
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +1 point for each other FLAME card they control."

"When this card is flipped Reveal a card from your hand. Destroy all cards on the board that share a faction with that card. If there are no cards in your hand, reveal a card from the top of the deck instead."
"At the end of the round You may flip this card face down and then flip your remaining face down card instead."
"Haha! Just a flesh wound!"
"Blood is thicker than water"
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +2 Points for each other FLAME card they control."
"When this card is flipped Swap this card with the opponent's flipped card"
"I will protect those who need it most!"
"At the end of the round If no cards have been removed from play this round, this card's power becomes 4."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +1 for each MIND card they control."
"Whilst this card is on the board Double the power of target FIGHTER card."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +2 Points for each other DEVIL'S LUCK card they control."
"When this card is flipped Return target FIGHTER card from the graveyard to your board. Negate it's ability."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +2 Points for each other PIRATE card they control."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +1 point for each other Might card they control."
"When this card is flipped If the opponents FLIPPED card has more power than this card, this card's power becomes 4."
"Whilst this card is on the board Double the power of all Might cards."
"Money and chaos, that all one needs in this life!"
"Whilst this card is on the board Double the power of all MIND cards."
"When this card is flipped Destroy target FIGHTER card on the board."
"When this card is flipped Replace this card with a card in your hand, if there are no cards in your hand replace this card with the card on top of the deck instead."
"When this card is flipped This card becomes a copy of target card on the board ."
"Whilst this card is on the board Target face down card cannot be flipped."
"My lord, why are you trying to test me with these sinners? Now I know what my final mission must be."
"The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few"
"At the end of the round If there are 4 or more different factions on the board, you gain +4 points."
"When this card is flipped Destroy target SUPPORT card on the board."
"At the end of the round If a card has been removed from play this round, this card's power becomes 4."
"At the end of the round If there are more SUPPORT cards on the board than FIGHTER cards, you gain +4 points."
"When this card is flipped Pick MIGHT or MIND, Destroy all cards on the board of that type."
"Whilst this card is on the board Players get +2 Points for each other MARINE card they control."
"This card cannot be destroyed."
"When this card is flipped If the opponents FLIPPED card is a SUPPORT, destroy that card."
"His shoes, wack! His clothes, wack! The way he defends a known murder, wack! I am a pinnacle, a pinnacle of fashion!"
"At the end of the round If you have lost a previous round this game, this card's power becomes 4."
